{"id":905481916,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"6 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1677436201,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"7 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/905481916/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Edit Distance","memory":"42.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int minDistance(String word1, String word2) {\n        \n        int m = word1.length();\n        int n = word2.length();\n        \n        int[][] ed = new int[m + 1][n + 1];\n        \n        for (int i = 0; i <= m; i++) {\n            for (int j = 0; j <= n; j++) {\n                \n                if (i == 0 && j == 0) {\n                    ed[i][j] = 0;\n                } else if (i == 0) {\n                    ed[i][j] = 1 + ed[i][j - 1];\n                } else if (j == 0) {\n                    ed[i][j] = 1 + ed[i - 1][j];\n                } else {\n                    if (word1.charAt(i - 1) == word2.charAt(j - 1)) {\n                        ed[i][j] = ed[i - 1][j - 1];\n                    } else {\n                        ed[i][j] = 1 + Math.min(ed[i - 1][j], Math.min(ed[i - 1][j - 1],\n                                                                       ed[i][j - 1]));\n                    }\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return ed[m][n];\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"edit-distance","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
